short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rate URLs and find quality content on the web faster with NeedleSearch. Lets you see a URL's score before you click on it in search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NeedleSearch is an extension that adds a like and dislike button to every page on the internet (by clicking on the extension icon), and shows the current like and dislike ratio in Google Search.

Extension source code - https://github.com/amitlevy/needlesearch-client

The extension is under active development and I'm looking for feedback, come discuss development on Discord! https://discord.gg/mkbzUK8zZN
